The synopsis: "Sacrifice for the Holy Grail."
August 1944, Paris is about to be liberated. The Kommandantur is full of rare coins. A German general refuses to obey Hitler's order to burn Paris. This man hides rare coins in the provinces. The abbey of Belval was to receive several of them, including the treasures of humanity. The place is kept secret, but the walls have ears.
